name: order_ts
description: Exact date and time when the order was placed

name: order_date
description: Date part of the order timestamp

name: customer_id
description: Unique ID of the customer placing the order

name: region
description: Geographical region of the customer (e.g., South, West, Midwest, Northeast)

name: channel
description: Sales channel where the order was made (e.g., Online, Retail, Partner)

name: product_category
description: Category of the product sold (e.g., Components, Laptops, Accessories)

name: discount_pct
description: Discount percentage applied to the product

name: unit_price_effect
description: Effective unit price after discount is applied

name: revenue
description: Total revenue for the order (unit_price_effect * units)
